name: Alkaa - Tasks simplified
shortDescription: Alkaa (begin, start in Finnish) is a to-do application project using the latest components, architecture and tools for Android development, such as Jetpack Compose, Coroutines and Dynamic Delivery.
longDescription: Alkaa (begin, start in Finnish) is a to-do application project using the latest components, architecture and tools for Android development, such as Jetpack Compose, Coroutines and Dynamic Delivery.
